## Shape.IsFlippedVertically property

Gets and sets whether shape is vertically flipped .

```csharp
public bool IsFlippedVertically { get; set; }
```

### Examples

```csharp

[C#]
if(shape.IsFlippedVertically == false)
    shape.IsFlippedVertically = true;
```
